name: Unhinged Maw Kiss
descrip: Deeply kiss your opponent. Can charm them.
outcome: [AttackerName] plants a greedy, almost devouring kiss on [TargetName]'s mouth, her abnormally long tongue pushing past [TargetHisOrHer]'s lips, almost threatening to invade [TargetHisOrHer] throat, as [AttackerName] stares [TargetHimOrHer] down with a predatory look!
miss: [AttackerName] tries to plant a greedy, predatory kiss on [TargetName]'s mouth but misses!
statusOutcome: [TargetName]'s mind fogs up from the overwhelming sexual advances as [TargetHeOrShe] feels increasing helpless! [TargetName] is charmed!
